about_the_game:
Do you need more drift?

More cars? More vinyls and stickers? More body kits and wheels? More tracks where you can feel goosebumps every turn? More burned tires and screeching brake discs?

So what are you waiting for?

Get access to all released and upcoming CarX Drift Racing Online DLCs with the Season Pass!

Details of the update:

* Access to all released DLCs
* Access to all future DLCs

All released DLC's won't show up in your Steam library, but the content will be available in game.

Does don include CarX Drift Racing Online - Deluxe DLC.
